situation: C was uncomfortable with the close proximity of others during circle time and reacted by pushing.
action: The teacher aide sensitively rearranged seating to create more room and explained the 'Bubble of Space' concept. Used a simple, child-friendly social story to reinforce understanding and provided C with a stress ball.
effect: C felt more comfortable with the increased space and the push stimulus was reduced, creating a more inclusive and pleasant circle time.
